name: post-color
description: Set post's text and background color
author: stefan.kaesche@artcom-venutre.de

scripts.start: wp-scripts start & npm run watch & gulp
scripts.build: (wp-scripts build && npm run compile:css) && gulp build && gulp po2mo
scripts.watch: node-sass css/ -o css/ --source-map true --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 -w
